title: DIN-like font from a re-release poster for “Le Cousin Jules”
content:
Note the lower case ‘g’.

Font: 

 Aaux 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112518/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

comments.content: The main text is **[Aaux Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112518/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=T-26%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Aaux%20ProLight%20-%20Regular&fid=2603356aef9cb87c1614c1cc2aea490b&fsize=48&text=Benicheti%20shots%20vistas%20French%20painting%20indelibly%20immersive&wrap=2)** by Neil Summerour [T-26]
